mil7.5.9:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘varahassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.5.9:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, varaho santattakathite gimhasamaye sampatte udakam upagacchati;
mil7.5.9:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena dosena citte alulitakhalitavibbhantasantatte sitalamatapanitamettabhavanam upagantabbam.
mil7.5.9:1.4: Idam, maharaja, varahassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.5.9:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, varaho cikkhallamudakamupagantva nasikaya pathavim khanitva donim katva donikaya sayati;
mil7.5.9:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena manase kayam nikkhipitva arammanantaragatena sayitabbam.
mil7.5.9:2.3: Idam, maharaja, varahassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
